com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.business.service

Interface ConfigurationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationServiceImpl, ConfigurationServiceImpl

    public ConfigurationService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(java.lang.String path)
      Checks if the given path is containing in the config.yml.
      <I> GuiItem findClickedGUIItem(java.lang.String path, I item)
      Tries to return a interface GuiItem matching the displayName and the lore of the given item. Can be called asynchronly. Uses the path parameter for faster fetching.
      java.util.List<com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.persistence.entity.GuiItem> findGUIItemCollection(java.lang.String path)
      Tries to return a list of interface GuiItem matching the given path from the config. Can be called asynchronly.
      <C> C findValue(java.lang.String path)
      Tries to load the config value from the given path. Throws a IllegalArgumentException if the path could not be correctly loaded.
      PetMeta generateDefaultPetMeta(java.lang.String uuid, java.lang.String name)
      Generates the default pet meta.
      java.nio.file.Path getDataFolder()
      Gets the Path to the configuration folder.
      java.io.InputStream openResourceInputStream(java.lang.String resource)
      Opens a new inputStream to the given resource.
      void refresh()
      Clears cached resources and refreshes the used configuration.

        <I> GuiItem findClickedGUIItem(java.lang.String path,

        Tries to return a interface GuiItem matching the displayName and the lore of the given item. Can be called asynchronly. Uses the path parameter for faster fetching.

        Type Parameters:
        I - the type of the itemstack.
        See Also:
